pesticide.PPE: Applicators and others exposed to the diluted spray solution must wear: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves such as barrier laminate or butyl rubber; Shoes plus socks; Protective eyewear. Mixers, loaders, cleaners, repairers of application equipment, and others exposed to the concentrate must wear: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves such as barrier laminate or butyl rubber; Socks and chemical-resistant footwear; Protective eyewear; Respirator as outlined below; Chemical-resistant apron.

Safety_Information.general_Info: This Product is an N-Methyl Carbamate insecticide.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Drink 1 or 2 glasses of water and induce vomiting by touching back of throat with finger. Do not induce vomiting or give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage. Atropine sulfate should be used for treatment. Administer repeated doses, 1.2 to 2.0 mg intravenously every 10 to 30 minutes until full atropinization is achieved and maintain until recovery. Artificial respiration or oxygen may be necessary. Do not use 2-PAM for LANNATE SP alone, but may supplement atropine for combined exposures. Do not use morphine.
